body_html: Actually, I'm not sure what's going on, even if you told me the version of TF you were using. In one case you are running outof GPU memory, in the other case we're getting an error from cudnn that tells me nothing about what happened (INTERNAL ERROR). I wish error messages were more informative :(

body: Actually, I'm not sure what's going on, even if you told me the version of TF you were using.  In one case you are running outof GPU memory, in the other case we're getting an error from cudnn that tells me nothing about what happened (INTERNAL ERROR).  I wish error messages were more informative :(
